title: Why ekko needs a nerf
body:
His Q. If you're any melee based champion, you've gotta get close to him to fight him right? If you're gonna be close to him his Q is almost guaranteed to hit you... like a 90% chance of it. The thing he throws has a pretty big radius so its close to impossible to dodge it at melee ranges. Now thats all fine and well but THE FLIPPIN SLOW IT HAS ! That slow is what needs a nerf !! It shouldn't slow you to the point you might as well be snared. Couple that with Ekko's passive, he can run circles around you. The kind of burst damage he can throw out is incredible ! 

I used to side with the people that said he doesn't need a nerf, its easy to outplay him. Which i agree with if you're trying to stay alive. Keep your distance and dodge skill shots and poke. But when you're a close range melee champ you can't do anything. If you get close range that Q burst and slow along with well.. anything ekko wants to do. W you into a stun ? E you for more burst damage? R you for overkill with hp regen? 

tldr; nerf his Q slow so its actually viable to trade melee shots with him. I don't have any problem with his other abilities on their own. He's pretty solid beside this slow.

2) Okay maybe it was a slight over-estimation on the amount of damage, but still 500+(130%x900)=1,670 that is insane damage right there. Plus he heals and he has other abilities to use after that.

The Q slow is fine, the problem is that his Q+passive slows and the speed boost he gets means unless you have bursty trades, he just came out on top.

Okay after the second game i played, I realise you're probably right. Its his passive proc + Q slow which makes it stupid. I think if they nerf that somehow it'd be alright. Ehh the second part is easy to dodge in lane, that's the part that hurts anyway. He is meant to be strong in the late game, just make sure you pick some hard cc and peel for your carries.
